Don't Go in the House

Ano: 1979

IMDb ID: tt0080646

Classificação: 5.6

Sinopse: Donny works in a factory which has incinerators but his coworkers are not aware that he is obsessed with fire and that he is a mentally disturbed man because as a child his mother punished him with burning to remove the evil outta him. After his mother's death, Donny gets excited as he is finally freed from her and starts playing loud music n lights a cigarette in the house but his excitement fades away soon when he begins to hear a voice in the house that seems to be his mother's. The voices n delusions about his mother being still alive makes Donny go crazy n he soon starts kidnapping women n later burns them alive.—Fella_shibby@yahoo.com
